official_title: To designate wilderness, acquire certain valuable inholdings, and for other purposes.
short_title: Alaska Peninsula Wilderness Designation Act of 1990

summary.text: Alaska Peninsula Wilderness Designation Act of 1990 - Designates the following lands in Alaska as components of the National Wilderness Preservation System: (1) the Aniakchak Wilderness within the Aniakchak National Monument and Preserve; (2) the Alaska Peninsula Wilderness within the Alaska Peninsula National Wildlife Refuge; and (3) the addition of specified lands within the Becharof National Wildlife Refuge to the Becharof Wilderness. Provides for the relinquishment of Koniag, Inc., Selection Rights (oil and gas rights) to specified lands in Alaska.

titles.title: Alaska Peninsula Wilderness Designation Act of 1990
To designate wilderness, acquire certain valuable inholdings, and for other purposes.
